```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(forecast)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)

plot.ts(AirPassengers)

ap=AirPassengers
ap
train=ap[1:134]
log_train <- log(train)

ap_ts=ts(log_train,start=c(1949,1),end=c(1960,2),frequency = 12)
ap_ts
ap_arim = auto.arima(ap_ts,seasonal = TRUE)
frcst=forecast(ap_arim,h=10,)
frcst=data.frame(frcst)
frcst
rename(frcst, 'forecast'='Point.Forecast')
names(frcst)[1]<-'forecast'
frcst$forecast
with_preds=c(ap_ts,frcst$forecast)


actuals=ap
autoplot(ts(frcst))
autoplot(ts(with_preds))
autoplot(log(actuals))

```
